name: Black Sails At Dawn
description:
Black Sails at Dawn is a strategy game, where the player has to plan routes and navigate their ships to fight evil pirates. The ships will fire single shots automatically if they are in range, but the player has to activate broadsides manually to maximize their damage.

The music (and sounds) of the game was composed by none other than Sebastian H., one of the greatest composers the world will ever see.

The game uses the "Pegleg-Engine", a custom engine built specifically for this game.

The game was developed as part of the games engineering course at the Julius-Maximilians-University Würzburg.

Special Thanks to:

Sebastian, Samuel, Simon, Mounsif, Sebastian, Daniel and Christopher
